briefTitle: Experiment on the Use of Innovative Computer Vision Technologies for Analysis of Medical Images in the Moscow Healthcare System
officialTitle: Experiment on the Use of Innovative Computer Vision Technologies for Analysis of Medical Images in the Moscow Healthcare System
conditions: AI (Artificial Intelligence), Mammary Cancer, Lung Cancer, X-Rays; Lesion, COVID-19, Chest--Diseases, Abdomen Disease, Brain Disease, Fractures, Bone
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age (over 18 years)
* Gender (male and female)
* Referral for the study
* Signed informed consent to participate in the Experiment
* Chest computed tomography and Low-dose computed tomography for lung cancer detection or mammography for breast cancer detection or chest X-ray for lung pathology detection

Exclusion Criteria:

* Another type of study (including a different modality and anatomical area)
